objects.specification: A large flat floor plane covering a 20 by 20 area with a low-profile thickness, finished in a sleek dark gray matte surface to allow free circulation around displayed items.
A moderately tall perimeter wall panel painted in a metallic gray finish with a smooth glossy surface, designed to enclose the booth space and provide a backdrop for branding and displays.
A matching metallic gray wall panel opposite the entrance wall, providing continuity in material and finish, with a high-gloss coating suitable for attaching graphics or logos.
A side wall panel finished in uniform metallic gray with a glossy sheen, offering a sleek enclosure and surface for mounting promotional banners or monitors.
A side wall panel identical to its counterpart, finished in high-gloss metallic gray to create a cohesive booth perimeter ideal for branding.
A low-profile raised rectangular platform with a brushed metal top surface and sharp clean edges, designed to elevate the demo car slightly above floor level and draw visitor attention.

children.specification: A sleek modern demo car with aerodynamic curves, painted in a vivid red metallic finish with glossy clearcoat. It features detailed wheels, tinted windows, and subtle chrome accents, oriented to face the booth entrance as a striking centerpiece.

objects.specification: A modern reception desk with a glossy black finish and bold red accent stripes along its edges, featuring clean minimalist lines and a smooth countertop for staff interaction.
A medium-height display stand with a glossy black pedestal base and angled clear glass top for brochures, featuring clean lines and unobtrusive design to avoid blocking sightlines to the car.
An identical glossy black brochure stand with a sleek angled top surface for car specifications and features, positioned to maintain clear views of the demo car.
A third matching brochure pedestal with a high-gloss finish and angled surface, ideal for showcasing printed materials without obstructing booth circulation.
A small modern chair with a molded plastic seat in charcoal gray, slender metal legs in matte black, and a minimalist aesthetic for visitor seating near reception.
An identical minimalist chair matching the other seating pieces, with a sleek modern profile and durable materials for comfort.
A third matching chair, arranged neatly to form a small seating cluster for visitor discussions.
A small round table with a smooth black tabletop and slender chrome legs, positioned centrally among seating to facilitate comfortable guest interactions.
A rectangular hanging banner attached to the side wall, featuring bold red and black car branding graphics on a glossy material, designed to catch the eye from across the booth.
A second high-impact banner with matching branding and glossy finish, hung on the opposite wall to balance the visual presentation.
An overhead spotlight fixture with a matte black housing and a bright white LED bulb, adjustable head to focus a sharp beam directly onto the demo car for dramatic illumination.
An identical adjustable spotlight mounted overhead, aimed at the display stand to highlight brochures and printed materials with crisp bright lighting.
A matching overhead LED spotlight with focused beam, designed to illuminate the display stand with high contrast and minimal spill light.
A fourth overhead fixture matching the others, positioned to throw a bright white beam onto the rear display stand, ensuring all key elements are well lit.
